juzs.text: Tabaraka allathee biyadihi almulku wahuwa AAala kulli shayin qadeerun
Allathee khalaqa almawta waalhayata liyabluwakum ayyukum ahsanu AAamalan wahuwa alAAazeezu alghafooru
Allathee khalaqa sabAAa samawatin tibaqan ma tara fee khalqi alrrahmani min tafawutin fairjiAAi albasara hal tara min futoorin
Thumma irjiAAi albasara karratayni yanqalib ilayka albasaru khasian wahuwa haseerun
Walaqad zayyanna alssamaa alddunya bimasabeeha wajaAAalnaha rujooman lilshshayateeni waaAAtadna lahum AAathaba alssaAAeeri
Walillatheena kafaroo birabbihim AAathabu jahannama wabisa almaseeru
Itha olqoo feeha samiAAoo laha shaheeqan wahiya tafooru
Takadu tamayyazu mina alghaythi kullama olqiya feeha fawjun saalahum khazanatuha alam yatikum natheerun
Qaloo bala qad jaana natheerun fakaththabna waqulna ma nazzala Allahu min shayin in antum illa fee dalalin kabeerin
Waqaloo law kunna nasmaAAu aw naAAqilu ma kunna fee ashabi alssaAAeeri
Inna allatheena yakhshawna rabbahum bialghaybi lahum maghfiratun waajrun kabeerun
Waasirroo qawlakum awi ijharoo bihi innahu AAaleemun bithati alssudoori
Ala yaAAlamu man khalaqa wahuwa allateefu alkhabeeru
Huwa allathee jaAAala lakumu alarda thaloolan faimshoo fee manakibiha wakuloo min rizqihi wailayhi alnnushooru
Aamintum man fee alssamai an yakhsifa bikumu alarda faitha hiya tamooru
Am amintum man fee alssamai an yursila AAalaykum hasiban fasataAAlamoona kayfa natheeri
Walaqad kaththaba allatheena min qablihim fakayfa kana nakeeri
Awalam yaraw ila alttayri fawqahum saffatin wayaqbidna ma yumsikuhunna illa alrrahmanu innahu bikulli shayin baseerun
Amman hatha allathee huwa jundun lakum yansurukum min dooni alrrahmani ini alkafiroona illa fee ghuroorin
Amman hatha allathee yarzuqukum in amsaka rizqahu bal lajjoo fee AAutuwwin wanufoorin
Afaman yamshee mukibban AAala wajhihi ahda amman yamshee sawiyyan AAala siratin mustaqeemin
Qul huwa allathee anshaakum wajaAAala lakumu alssamAAa waalabsara waalafidata qaleelan ma tashkuroona
Qul huwa allathee tharaakum fee alardi wailayhi tuhsharoona
Wayaqooloona mata hatha alwaAAdu in kuntum sadiqeena
Qul innama alAAilmu AAinda Allahi wainnama ana natheerun mubeenun
Falamma raawhu zulfatan seeat wujoohu allatheena kafaroo waqeela hatha allathee kuntum bihi taddaAAoona
Qul araaytum in ahlakaniya Allahu waman maAAiya aw rahimana faman yujeeru alkafireena min AAathabin aleemin
Qul huwa alrrahmanu amanna bihi waAAalayhi tawakkalna fasataAAlamoona man huwa fee dalalin mubeenin
Qul araaytum in asbaha maokum ghawran faman yateekum bimain maAAeenin
Inna rabbaka huwa aAAlamu biman dalla AAan sabeelihi wahuwa aAAlamu bialmuhtadeena
Itha tutla AAalayhi ayatuna qala asateeru alawwaleena
Inna balawnahum kama balawna ashaba aljannati ith aqsamoo layasrimunnaha musbiheena
Fatafa AAalayha taifun min rabbika wahum naimoona
Ani ighdoo AAala harthikum in kuntum sarimeena
An la yadkhulannaha alyawma AAalaykum miskeenun
Qala awsatuhum alam aqul lakum lawla tusabbihoona
Qaloo subhana rabbina inna kunna thalimeena
Qaloo ya waylana inna kunna tagheena
AAasa rabbuna an yubdilana khayran minha inna ila rabbina raghiboona
Kathalika alAAathabu walaAAathabu alakhirati akbaru law kanoo yaAAlamoona
Inna lilmuttaqeena AAinda rabbihim jannati alnnaAAeemi
Am lakum aymanun AAalayna balighatun ila yawmi alqiyamati inna lakum lama tahkumoona
Am lahum shurakao falyatoo bishurakaihim in kanoo sadiqeena
Yawma yukshafu AAan saqin wayudAAawna ila alssujoodi fala yastateeAAoona
KhashiAAatan absaruhum tarhaquhum thillatun waqad kanoo yudAAawna ila alssujoodi wahum salimoona
Fatharnee waman yukaththibu bihatha alhadeethi sanastadrijuhum min haythu la yaAAlamoona
Am tasaluhum ajran fahum min maghramin muthqaloona
Faisbir lihukmi rabbika wala takun kasahibi alhooti ith nada wahuwa makthoomun
Lawla an tadarakahu niAAmatun min rabbihi lanubitha bialAAarai wahuwa mathmoomun
Wain yakadu allatheena kafaroo layuzliqoonaka biabsarihim lamma samiAAoo alththikra wayaqooloona innahu lamajnoonun
Waamma AAadun faohlikoo bireehin sarsarin AAatiyatin
Sakhkharaha AAalayhim sabAAa layalin wathamaniyata ayyamin husooman fatara alqawma feeha sarAAa kaannahum aAAjazu nakhlin khawiyatun
Wajaa firAAawnu waman qablahu waalmutafikatu bialkhatiati
FaAAasaw rasoola rabbihim faakhathahum akhthatan rabiyatan
Inna lamma tagha almao hamalnakum fee aljariyati
LinajAAalaha lakum tathkiratan wataAAiyaha othunun waAAiyatun
Faitha nufikha fee alssoori nafkhatun wahidatun
Wahumilati alardu waaljibalu fadukkata dakkatan wahidatan
Waalmalaku AAala arjaiha wayahmilu AAarsha rabbika fawqahum yawmaithin thamaniyatun
Yawmaithin tuAAradoona la takhfa minkum khafiyatun
Faamma man ootiya kitabahu biyameenihi fayaqoolu haomu iqraoo kitabiyah
Kuloo waishraboo haneean bima aslaftum fee alayyami alkhaliyati
Waamma man ootiya kitabahu bishimalihi fayaqoolu ya laytanee lam oota kitabiyah
Thumma fee silsilatin tharAAuha sabAAoona thiraAAan faoslukoohu
Innahu kana la yuminu biAllahi alAAatheemi
Wama huwa biqawli shaAAirin qaleelan ma tuminoona
Wala biqawli kahinin qaleelan ma tathakkaroona
Fama minkum min ahadin AAanhu hajizeena
TaAAruju almalaikatu waalrroohu ilayhi fee yawmin kana miqdaruhu khamseena alfa sanatin
Yubassaroonahum yawaddu almujrimu law yaftadee min AAathabi yawmiithin bibaneehi
Waman fee alardi jameeAAan thumma yunjeehi
Waallatheena hum min AAathabi rabbihim mushfiqoona
Illa AAala azwajihim aw ma malakat aymanuhum fainnahum ghayru maloomeena
Famani ibtagha waraa thalika faolaika humu alAAadoona
AyatmaAAu kullu imriin minhum an yudkhala jannata naAAeemin
Fala oqsimu birabbi almashariqi waalmagharibi inna laqadiroona
AAala an nubaddila khayran minhum wama nahnu bimasbooqeena
Fatharhum yakhoodoo wayalAAaboo hatta yulaqoo yawmahumu allathee yooAAadoona
Yawma yakhrujoona mina alajdathi siraAAan kaannahum ila nusubin yoofidoona
KhashiAAatan absaruhum tarhaquhum thillatun thalika alyawmu allathee kanoo yooAAadoona
Inna arsalna noohan ila qawmihi an anthir qawmaka min qabli an yatiyahum AAathabun aleemun
Qala ya qawmi innee lakum natheerun mubeenun
Yaghfir lakum min thunoobikum wayuakhkhirkum ila ajalin musamman inna ajala Allahi itha jaa la yuakhkharu law kuntum taAAlamoona
Qala rabbi innee daAAawtu qawmee laylan wanaharan
Wainnee kullama daAAawtuhum litaghfira lahum jaAAaloo asabiAAahum fee athanihim waistaghshaw thiyabahum waasarroo waistakbaroo istikbaran
Thumma innee aAAlantu lahum waasrartu lahum israran
Faqultu istaghfiroo rabbakum innahu kana ghaffaran
Wayumdidkum biamwalin wabaneena wayajAAal lakum jannatin wayajAAal lakum anharan
Ma lakum la tarjoona lillahi waqaran
Alam taraw kayfa khalaqa Allahu sabAAa samawatin tibaqan
WajaAAala alqamara feehinna nooran wajaAAala alshshamsa sirajan
Qala noohun rabbi innahum AAasawnee waittabaAAoo man lam yazidhu maluhu wawaladuhu illa khasaran
Waqaloo la tatharunna alihatakum wala tatharunna waddan wala suwaAAan wala yaghootha wayaAAooqa wanasran
Waqad adalloo katheeran wala tazidi alththalimeena illa dalalan
Mimma khateeatihim oghriqoo faodkhiloo naran falam yajidoo lahum min dooni Allahi ansaran
Waqala noohun rabbi la tathar AAala alardi mina alkafireena dayyaran
Innaka in tatharhum yudilloo AAibadaka wala yalidoo illa fajiran kaffaran
Rabbi ighfir lee waliwalidayya waliman dakhala baytiya muminan walilmumineena waalmuminati wala tazidi alththalimeena illa tabaran
Qul oohiya ilayya annahu istamaAAa nafarun mina aljinni faqaloo inna samiAAna quranan AAajaban
Yahdee ila alrrushdi faamanna bihi walan nushrika birabbina ahadan
Waannahu taAAala jaddu rabbina ma ittakhatha sahibatan wala waladan
Waannahu kana yaqoolu safeehuna AAala Allahi shatatan
Waanna thananna an lan taqoola alinsu waaljinnu AAala Allahi kathiban
Waannahu kana rijalun mina alinsi yaAAoothoona birijalin mina aljinni fazadoohum rahaqan
Waannahum thannoo kama thanantum an lan yabAAatha Allahu ahadan
Waanna lamasna alssamaa fawajadnaha muliat harasan shadeedan washuhuban
Waanna kunna naqAAudu minha maqaAAida lilssamAAi faman yastamiAAi alana yajid lahu shihaban rasadan
Waanna la nadree asharrun oreeda biman fee alardi am arada bihim rabbuhum rashadan
Waanna minna alssalihoona waminna doona thalika kunna taraiqa qidadan
Wanna thananna an lan nuAAjiza Allaha fee alardi walan nuAAjizahu haraban
Waanna lamma samiAAna alhuda amanna bihi faman yumin birabbihi fala yakhafu bakhsan wala rahaqan
Waanna minna almuslimoona waminna alqasitoona faman aslama faolaika taharraw rashadan
Waallawi istaqamoo AAala alttareeqati laasqaynahum maan ghadaqan
Linaftinahum feehi waman yuAArid AAan thikri rabbihi yaslukhu AAathaban saAAadan
Waanna almasajida lillahi fala tadAAoo maAAa Allahi ahadan
Waannahu lamma qama AAabdu Allahi yadAAoohu kadoo yakoonoona AAalayhi libadan
Qul innama adAAoo rabbee wala oshriku bihi ahadan
Qul innee la amliku lakum darran wala rashadan
Qul innee lan yujeeranee mina Allahi ahadun walan ajida min doonihi multahadan
Illa balaghan mina Allahi warisalatihi waman yaAAsi Allaha warasoolahu fainna lahu nara jahannama khalideena feeha abadan
Hatta itha raaw ma yooAAadoona fasayaAAlamoona man adAAafu nasiran waaqallu AAadadan
Qul in adree aqareebun ma tooAAadoona am yajAAalu lahu rabbee amadan
AAalimu alghaybi fala yuthhiru AAala ghaybihi ahadan
Illa mani irtada min rasoolin fainnahu yasluku min bayni yadayhi wamin khalfihi rasadan
LiyaAAlama an qad ablaghoo risalati rabbihim waahata bima ladayhim waahsa kulla shayin AAadadan
Aw zid AAalayhi warattili alqurana tarteelan
Inna nashiata allayli hiya ashaddu watan waaqwamu qeelan
Inna laka fee alnnahari sabhan taweelan
Waothkuri isma rabbika watabattal ilayhi tabteelan
Rabbu almashriqi waalmaghribi la ilaha illa huwa faittakhithhu wakeelan
Waisbir AAala ma yaqooloona waohjurhum hajran jameelan
Watharnee waalmukaththibeena olee alnnaAAmati wamahhilhum qaleelan
Yawma tarjufu alardu waaljibalu wakanati aljibalu katheeban maheelan
Inna arsalna ilaykum rasoolan shahidan AAalaykum kama arsalna ila firAAawna rasoolan
FaAAasa firAAawnu alrrasoola faakhathnahu akhthan wabeelan
Fakayfa tattaqoona in kafartum yawman yajAAalu alwildana sheeban
Alssamao munfatirun bihi kana waAAduhu mafAAoolan
Inna hathihi tathkiratun faman shaa ittakhatha ila rabbihi sabeelan

Inna rabbaka yaAAlamu annaka taqoomu adna min thuluthayi allayli wanisfahu wathuluthahu wataifatun mina allatheena maAAaka waAllahu yuqaddiru allayla waalnnahara AAalima an lan tuhsoohu fataba AAalaykum faiqraoo ma tayassara mina alqurani AAalima an sayakoonu minkum marda waakharoona yadriboona fee alardi yabtaghoona min fadli Allahi waakharoona yuqatiloona fee sabeeli Allahi faiqraoo ma tayassara minhu waaqeemoo alssalata waatoo alzzakata waaqridoo Allaha qardan hasanan wama tuqaddimoo lianfusikum min khayrin tajidoohu AAinda Allahi huwa khayran waaAAthama ajran waistaghfiroo Allaha inna Allaha ghafoorun raheemun
Faqala in hatha illa sihrun yutharu

Wama jaAAalna ashaba alnnari illa malaikatan wama jaAAalna AAiddatahum illa fitnatan lillatheena kafaroo liyastayqina allatheena ootoo alkitaba wayazdada allatheena amanoo eemanan wala yartaba allatheena ootoo alkitaba waalmuminoona waliyaqoola allatheena fee quloobihim maradun waalkafiroona matha arada Allahu bihatha mathalan kathalika yudillu Allahu man yashao wayahdee man yashao wama yaAAlamu junooda rabbika illa huwa wama hiya illa thikra lilbashari
Liman shaa minkum an yataqaddama aw yataakhkhara
Bal yureedu kullu imriin minhum an yuta suhufan munashsharatan
Wama yathkuroona illa an yashaa Allahu huwa ahlu alttaqwa waahlu almaghfirati
Bala qadireena AAala an nusawwiya bananahu
Yunabbao alinsanu yawmaithin bima qaddama waakhkhara
La tuharrik bihi lisanaka litaAAjala bihi
Alam yaku nutfatan min manayyin yumna
Alaysa thalika biqadirin AAala an yuhyiya almawta
Hal ata AAala alinsani heenun mina alddahri lam yakun shayan mathkooran
Inna khalaqna alinsana min nutfatin amshajin nabtaleehi fajaAAalnahu sameeAAan baseeran
Inna hadaynahu alssabeela imma shakiran waimma kafooran
Inna aAAtadna lilkafireena salasila waaghlalan wasaAAeeran
Inna alabrara yashraboona min kasin kana mizajuha kafooran
AAaynan yashrabu biha AAibadu Allahi yufajjiroonaha tafjeeran
Yoofoona bialnnathri wayakhafoona yawman kana sharruhu mustateeran
WayutAAimona alttaAAama AAala hubbihi miskeenan wayateeman waaseeran
Innama nutAAimukum liwajhi Allahi la nureedu minkum jazaan wala shukooran
Inna nakhafu min rabbina yawman AAaboosan qamtareeran
Fawaqahumu Allahu sharra thalika alyawmi walaqqahum nadratan wasurooran
Muttakieena feeha AAala alaraiki la yarawna feeha shamsan wala zamhareeran
Wadaniyatan AAalayhim thilaluha wathullilat qutoofuha tathleelan
Wayutafu AAalayhim bianiyatin min fiddatin waakwabin kanat qawareera
Wayusqawna feeha kasan kana mizajuha zanjabeelan
Wayatoofu AAalayhim wildanun mukhalladoona itha raaytahum hasibtahum luluan manthooran
Waitha raayta thamma raayta naAAeeman wamulkan kabeeran
AAaliyahum thiyabu sundusin khudrun waistabraqun wahulloo asawira min fiddatin wasaqahum rabbuhum sharaban tahooran
Inna hatha kana lakum jazaan wakana saAAyukum mashkooran
Inna nahnu nazzalna AAalayka alqurana tanzeelan
Faisbir lihukmi rabbika wala tutiAA minhum athiman aw kafooran
Wamina allayli faosjud lahu wasabbihhu laylan taweelan
Inna haolai yuhibboona alAAajilata wayatharoona waraahum yawman thaqeelan
Nahnu khalaqnahum washadadna asrahum waitha shina baddalna amthalahum tabdeelan
Inna hathihi tathkiratun faman shaa ittakhatha ila rabbihi sabeelan
Wama tashaoona illa an yashaa Allahu inna Allaha kana AAaleeman hakeeman
Yudkhilu man yashao fee rahmatihi waalththalimeena aAAadda lahum AAathaban aleeman
WajaAAalna feeha rawasiya shamikhatin waasqaynakum maan furatan
Intaliqoo ila ma kuntum bihi tukaththiboona
Intaliqoo ila thillin thee thalathi shuAAabin
La thaleelin wala yughnee mina allahabi
Kuloo waishraboo haneean bima kuntum taAAmaloona
Waitha qeela lahumu irkaAAoo la yarkaAAoona
